data.oai_dc:dc: This data file contains functional MRI data of subject 5 in Experiment 2. Specifically, the data file contains the functional MRI time series (EPI T2*w, nifti format) of Session 2, runs 4-6, the structural MRI data (T1w and PD contrast, nifti format, de-faced), and reversed phase encoded (AP-PA) images for distortion correction. For details on stimuli and experimental design please see the data file: “DesignProtocolsStimuli_Experiment2”
auditory cortex|functional MRI|natural sounds|computational modeling|spectrotemporal modulations
